Class User

java.lang.Object
application.User
public class User extends Object
The User class represents a user entity in the system. It contains the user's details such as userName, password, and roles.

Users can have multiple roles, which determine their permissions within the system. Available roles include "student", "reviewer", and "instructor".

    • canAskQuestions

      public boolean canAskQuestions()
      Checks if the user has permission to ask questions. This permission is granted to users with the "student" role.
      Returns:
      true if the user can ask questions, false otherwise

      Returns:

      public boolean canPromoteReviewer()

      Returns:
      true if the user can promote reviewers, false otherwise
